net.sf.mmm.util.bean.impl

Class BeanAccessBase<BEAN extends Bean>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.util.bean.impl.BeanAccessBase<BEAN>
  • Type Parameters:
    BEAN - the generic type of the intercepted bean.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<WritableProperty<?>>, InvocationHandler, BeanAccess, JsonSupport
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BeanAccessInstance, BeanAccessPrototype

    public abstract class BeanAccessBase<BEAN extends Bean>
extends Object
implements InvocationHandler, BeanAccess, Iterable<WritableProperty<?>>
    This is the abstract base implementation of BeanAccess.
    Since:
    8.0.0
    Author:
    hohwille

        Serializes this object as JSON (JavaScript-Object-Notation).
        Specified by:

        See Also:

      • fromJson

        public void fromJson(javax.json.stream.JsonParser json)
        Description copied from interface: JsonSupport
        Deserializes this object from JSON (JavaScript-Object-Notation). This operation is typically NOT symmetric to JsonSupport.toJson(JsonGenerator) - e.g. JsonSupport.toJson(JsonGenerator) might write a property with its value while JsonSupport.fromJson(JsonParser) may only deserialze the value as the parent object has to handle the property names that may appear in any order.
        Specified by:
        fromJson in interface JsonSupport
        Parameters:
        json - the JsonParser to read from.

      • fromJsonProperty

        protected void fromJsonProperty(javax.json.stream.JsonParser json)

        json - the JsonParser.

      • fromJsonUndefinedProperty

        protected void fromJsonUndefinedProperty(javax.json.stream.JsonParser json,
                                         String propertyName)
        Called from fromJsonProperty(JsonParser) to parse a property that does not (yet) exist.
        Parameters:
        json - the JsonParser.
        propertyName - the name of the missing property to parse.
